alert.note: Alert for East Carroll (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 12 at 11:05PM CDT until October 13 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Chicot County in southeastern Arkansas... Northeastern East Carroll Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Southern Washington County in northwestern Mississippi... Northwestern Issaquena County in west central Mississippi... Southwestern Humphreys County in central Mississippi... Northern Sharkey County in west central Mississippi... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1105 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Leland to 6 miles southwest of Avon to 7 miles east of Parkdale, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Hollandale and Estill around 1115 PM CDT. Darlove and Glen Allan around 1120 PM CDT. Gassoway and Grace around 1125 PM CDT. Panther Burn and Murphy around 1130 PM CDT. Anguilla, Nitta Yuma and Delta City around 1135 PM CDT. Midnight around 1145 PM CDT. Rolling Fork around 1155 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Mayersville, Arcola and Louise. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
